00062     class Quake3Level : public ResourceAlloc

00087         /* Extracts the embedded lightmap texture data and loads them as textures.
00088            Calling this method makes the lightmap texture data embedded in
00089            the .bsp file available to the renderer. Lightmaps are extracted
00090            and loaded as Texture objects (subclass specific to RenderSystem
00091            subclass) and are named "@lightmap1", "@lightmap2" etc.
00092         */
00093         void extractLightmaps(void) const;

00112
